title: Bring back classic ASP with jscript
body: I'm the founder of a company producing a web based EHR on classic ASP with jscript (not vbscript) since 2001. I've looked at and tried almost every platform that was or is since then (java, PHP, ASP.NET, Ruby/Rails, node, python, scala, go) and have yet to find a superior development platform.

comments.body: This is the wrong forum, this forum is dedicated to Microsoft Edge. please post at https://github.com/aspnet/AspNetCore

Completely agree with you !
We've been using Classic ASP for more than 20 years now, running now on Windows 2016 server. Big apps. Very good performance, stable, simple. Lots of custom Dlls as you say, mostly base VBScript, with some JavaScript mixing when we need to perform on the fly interpretation (evals !) or date manipulations...
+1 for classic ASP to be brought back. But it has to be kept VERY simple, as it is now !
:-)
